title: E-commerce API Documentation
description:
Dynamic E-Commerce Workflow Management. The system features dynamic 
routes for order processing, real-time inventory updates, and secure 
user authentication. It also supports seamless checkout, order 
reporting and comprehensive product management. Documented Backend API 
published publicly using Postman.

title: Community Blog API Documentation
description: API for a community blog platform with user accounts, post creation, comments, and social interactions.
